item.title: 20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day
item.description:
20 Romantic Things To Do In Wine Country This Valentine's Day

There will be plenty of love in the Wine Country air this Valentine's Day as couples celebrate not just the most romantic day of the year but a three-day weekend thanks to President's Day. We've rounded up 20 romantic things to do in Wine Country-10 in the Napa Valley and 10 in Sonoma County-so you can get started on your Feb.

A Napa vineyard's high-tech logic control system can detect risk factors before they develop into wine-spoiling problems.

item.title: JCB Interactive Wine Tasting
item.description:
JCB Interactive Wine Tasting

Ideum has collaborated with JCB Wines to create an entirely new wine tasting experience for their Yountville, California tasting lounge. Guests gather around a custom Ideum Platform 55 multitouch table with a gold top and black crocodile-skin base. Then they are guided through a 45-minute tasting experience in which they can explore the inspiration for and information about the wines they taste.

item.title: Graphene 3D Lab and Ideum Team Up for an Interactive Wine Tasting Experience
item.description:
Graphene 3D Lab and Ideum Team Up for an Interactive Wine Tasting Experience

Wow this is cool! "Jean-Charles Boisset, JCB Wines in Yountville, California has developed the JCB Wine Tasting Experience, which involves smart technology, 3D printed wine glasses, and some very sophisticated software. The experience takes place in the new JCB Tasting Salon, which features smart tables that seat four people each. Visitors are served five different wines over the course of the tasting, which lasts for 40 minutes to an hour."

item.description:
